DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare success rate two surgical protocol . One protocol implant place time tooth extraction place function . The protocol implant place heal extraction site place function .
DOC.brief_title: `` Prospective Evaluation Immediate & Early Loading Zimmer Hydroxyapatite Coated Dental Implants ''
DOC.detailed_description: Forty-eight patient ( 22 men , 26 woman ) enrol study receive 48 implant . The population divide 2 group : Group A implant ( n=23 ) load immediately day surgery Group B implant ( n=19 ) load 3 week surgery . Cone Beam Computed Tomography ( CBCT ) scan take preoperatively aid treatment planning . Bone density evaluate CBCT scan Hounsfield unit ( HU ) tactile feedback surgery . Insertion torque record time implant placement . Resonance frequency analysis , perform day surgery , time loading , 6 , 12 24 month , use record implant stability accord unit 's Implant Stability Quotient ( Osstell ISQ ) . Standardized radiograph take time implant placement 6 , 12 24 month measure crestal bone stability . Bone level change measure software ( Image J , available online : http : //rsbweb.nih.gov/ij/download.html ; last access 28 August 2014 ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . May either male female 2 . Must least 18 year age 3 . Must sufficiently good health undergo routine dental treatment . include surgical procedure associate placement dental implant . 4 . Must partially edentulous require single dental implant maxilla mandible 5 . Must sufficient amount native bone heal bone graft site ( socket grafting , maxillary sinus augmentation ridge augmentation ) . 6 . Must active infection 7 . Must adequate bone height least 10mm long dental implant 8 . Must physically , emotionally financially able undergo surgical procedure plan 9 . Must adequately compliant 1 . Have requirement antibiotic premedication infective endocarditis , artificial joint condition 2 . Have uncontrolled hypertension 3 . Have uncontrolled diabetes 4 . Are serological HIV positive 5 . Have history significant heart , stomach , liver , kidney , blood , immune system organ impairment systemic disease would prevent undergo propose treatment 6 . Smoke cigarettes use tobacco product 7 . Have take investigational drug anytime previous month 8 . Have dental condition likely require treatment , necessitate exit study deep cavity , abscess , moderatesevere gum disease 9 . Have radiation therapy head neck 10 . Are unwilling unable sign inform consent 11 . Do n't demonstrate willingness return require number visit 12 . Need immediate dental implant placement follow tooth extraction
